ifnull(t12.currency_amount_tax_zfz, 0) - ifnull(t12.currency_amount_tax_yzf, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_wzf from s_man_manufacture_outsource_settle t LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t1 ON t1.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t2 ON t2.plant_sid = t.plant_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_contract t3 ON t3.purchase_contract_sid = t.purchase_contract_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 on t4.user_name=t.creator_account and t4.client_id=t.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t5 on t5.user_name=t.updater_account and t5.client_id=t.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 on t6.user_name=t.confirmer_account and t6.client_id=t.client_id LEFT JOIN s_sys_form_process t7 ON t7.form_id = t.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t8 ON t8.user_id = t7.create_by_id and t8.client_id=t7.client_id LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t9 ON t9.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_type_manufacture_outsource_settle t10 ON t10.code = t.document_type LEFT JOIN s_con_bu_type_manufacture_outsource_settle t11 ON t11.code = t.business_type LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid, sum(if(a1.handle_status = '3', a.currency_amount_tax, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_zfz, sum(if(a1.handle_status = '5', a.currency_amount_tax, 0)) as currency_amount_tax_yzf FROM s_fin_pay_bill_item_outsource_settle a LEFT JOIN s_fin_pay_bill a1 ON a.pay_bill_sid = a1.pay_bill_sid WHERE a1.handle_status in ('5','3') GROUP BY a.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid ) t12 on t.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid = t12.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid
